name: Arrow Aviation, LLC
about: Arrow Aviation, LLC, located in Danbury, CT, is a premier flight school offering personalized flight training for all single engine land pilot certificates and ratings, including instrument ratings. Our training is conducted on an individual basis with FAA-certified instructors, tailored to each student's schedule and needs. We utilize a range of aircraft, including Cessna 152s, Cessna 172s, and Piper Warriors, all maintained to high standards by full-time maintenance personnel. Our facility includes a RedBird FMX advanced aviation training device and offers FAA airmen written tests and practical exams. We prioritize safety and building strong relationships with our students, ensuring a supportive and intimate learning environment. With an accident-free record and a focus on quality over volume, Arrow Aviation is committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
